title: Webinar: Strengthening Private Sector Extension Advisory Services

tasks.task: Participate in a webinar on Strengthening Private Sector Extension and Advisory Services
subtasks: Listen to an Introduction by Julie McCarty
Understand the importance of private sector extension and advisory services
Examine the portfolio review findings from 28 Feed the Future and Aligned Countries
Analyze design considerations for extension programs
Consider implementation challenges, such as reliance on public extension, limited ICT use, and subsidy practices

Investigate potential interventions for strengthening private sector extension, including policy formulation, public sector support, producer organization strengthening, input supplier improvement, and stakeholder consultation

tasks.task: Listen to Robert Anyang's Case Study on the Village Agent Model in Uganda
subtasks: Understand the challenges of traditional extension systems in Uganda
Learn about the community push and marketing model (Village Agent Model)
Analyze the components of the Village Agent Model, including agent roles, sustainability, and benefits
Evaluate strategies for overcoming mistrust and monopoly issues in the model

tasks.task: Listen to Jean-Michel Vossard's Case Study on Senegal Natalne Bay Project
subtasks: Understand the project's goals and scaling approach
Analyze the structure and impact of farmer-based organizations in delivering extension services
Examine the use of farmer-owned databases and digital technology in extension
Evaluate the success of networks in maintaining services after project closeout and their diverse revenue streams

tasks.task: Participate in Q&A sessions with presenters on extension and advisory service best practices
subtasks: Learn about incentives for network leaders' continued involvement post-project
Understand strategies for gender integration in extension services
Explore the role of young people and women in extension systems and digital technologies
Discuss the importance of stakeholder engagement and innovation platforms for extension system development
